name: intermediately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a position between two other related things, levels, or points: intermediately between Humans appeared on the planet intermediately between gorillas and orangutans. We used three categories to classify the levels of danger: low, intermediately high, and very high.
More examplesFewer examplesThe warehouse is located intermediately between the main customer base and the factory.The report provides a summary of the clinical experiences of small and intermediately sized groups of patients.The country's life expectancy is intermediately located between that of developed counties and that of developing countries.
